sentences.en: A Luton van has additional load space over the driver's cab.
sentences.cn: 卢顿厢式货车的驾驶室上方有富余的装载空间。

sentences.en: Deliveries are made by common carrier or van line.
sentences.cn: 货物运输采用普通货车或厢式货车。

sentences.en: Graham put the van in neutral and jumped out into the road.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆把货车挂到空挡，自己跳到马路上。

sentences.en: He dipped his headlights as they came up behind a slow-moving van.
sentences.cn: 当他们靠近一辆缓慢行驶的货车时，他把汽车前灯调成了近光。

sentences.en: He made a living of sorts selling pancakes from a van.
sentences.cn: 他靠用货车卖薄饼勉强度日。

sentences.en: He was catapulted into the side of the van.
sentences.cn: 他被弹飞出去，撞在货车的侧面。

sentences.en: His van allegedly struck the two as they were crossing a street.
sentences.cn: 据称，他的货车在那两人过马路时撞上了他们。

sentences.en: I peered through a tear in the van's curtains.
sentences.cn: 我通过篷车帘子的破洞窥视。

sentences.en: It was unbelievably dramatic as lightning crackled all round the van.
sentences.cn: 闪电在货车周围炸开时，情景异常壮观。

sentences.en: Pulling out to overtake, the car collided head-on with a van.
sentences.cn: 越线超车时，轿车和一辆厢式货车迎面相撞。

sentences.en: The coffin was loaded into the van of the train.
sentences.cn: 棺材被装进了火车的行李车厢内。

sentences.en: There was a loud thump as the horse crashed into the van.
sentences.cn: 马撞在货车上发出砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: They helped us put our gear back into the van.
sentences.cn: 他们帮我们把装备放回到小货车里。

sentences.en: They traced the van to a New Jersey car rental agency.
sentences.cn: 他们查出面包车属于新泽西州的一家租车行。

sentences.en: Van Gogh had a major influence on the development of modern painting.
sentences.cn: 凡·高对现代绘画的发展有着重大影响。

sentences.en: We spent years travelling around in a rusty old van.
sentences.cn: 我们多年来都开着一辆生锈的旧货车四处旅行。

phrases.tran_cn: 杰夫范甘迪（美国篮球教练）
范布伦（姓氏）；范布伦（美国第八任总统）；范布伦（美国城市）
范德瓦尔斯（荷兰物理学家， 曾获1910年诺贝尔物理学奖）

trans.tran_cn: 先锋，厢式货车，增值网，先驱，前驱，领袖，领导人
trans.tran_en: a vehicle used especially for carrying goods, which is smaller than a truck and has a roof and usually no windows at the sides
